definitions: If you think that someone behaves or lives in a way that is morally good, you can say that they are righteous. People sometimes use righteous to express their disapproval when they think someone is only behaving in this way so that others will admire or support them.
characterized by, proceeding from, or in accordance with accepted standards of morality, justice, or uprightness; virtuous
morally justifiable or right, esp from one's own point of view
acting in a just, upright manner; doing what is right; virtuous
good, excellent, satisfying, pleasant, authentic, etc.
